title: CN Level 8 â€” Small Office Network Design
intro: This level uses a small office network as a design scenario.
points: Identify devices needed: router, switch, access point, end-hosts.
Understand IP addressing and subnetting at simple office scale.
Consider wired vs wireless access for different areas.
Plan basic network topology (star, tree) for the office.
Handle Internet access, internal services and basic segmentation.
